text: @DWUhlfelderLaw A republican governor whose lips are firmly attached to the great orange pumpkin, cooking the reported #s of covid-19 related  illnesses and deaths.  Lying, cheating, republicans in Florida getting elected.  Do better Florida citizens because your friends & families are dying.
